nodes.text: Star Wars Be a Pilot in 3-D
Star Wars Be a Pliot in 3-D is a planned Star Wars 3D activity book dealing with pilots.

Take a seat and learn to pilot the most iconic ships and vehicles in the Star Wars galaxy! Each featured ship includes a full-page illustration of the control panels and the view of a battle scene from the cockpit—in 3D! The following pages delve into the parts of the ship, its capabilities and weaknesses; what it takes to be a pilot; as well as notable battles or pilots associated with each ship. Do you have what it takes to pilot the greatest vehicles in the galaxy?
